txt.en: Use the Call Radhril skill and talk to Radhril
'Let us proceed with caution. We do not yet know why Svalfang wanders through the Wildwood.'
Use the summoning horn at the east side of the hill to summon Radhril to your side.
You should talk to Radhril.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
You should find Svalfang.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
You have been tasked with defeating the Hill Giant, Svalfang, in the Wildwood.
'I commend your efforts, [placeholder]! Come, let us return and report our success to the Free Peoples.'
'Where is my gold, Orcs?! I thought we had a deal! Show yourselves to me!'
You should defeat Svalfang.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
